lyrics.text:
Ko hoku maama’anga Koe,
Sīsū ē!
He La’ā ‘o hoku laumālie,
Sīsū ē!
Neongo ‘ete po’ulia;
He langi ‘ao’aofia;
Te u maama pe ka ta ‘i ai,
Sīsū ē!

Ko hoku malohinga Koe,
Sīsū ē!
He pā ‘o hoku laumālie,
Sīsū ē!
Neongo ‘e kāpui au
He tau ‘o Heli lau teau;
Te u hao pe ka ta ‘i ai,
Sīsū ē!

Ko hoku ‘ofa’anga Koe,
Sīsū ē!
He To’utakanga piki ma’u pē,
Sīsū ē!
Ha potu pe te u nofo ai,
‘I heni, pe ‘i Hēvani:
Te u lata pe ka ta ‘i ai,
Sīsū ē!
